subject: Lesson Report for Val (Tue Nov 21, 2023 at 06:30 PM)
body:
Val Lessons Report: Tue Nov 21, 2023 at 06:30 PM

We worked on "You've Got a Friend in Me" and Val did great!!!

Here is the chord chart that we used:

You've Got a Friend in Me Chord Chart

Val has the skills to learn the bridge on his own.

Then, we explored the song "The Weight" to solidify an understanding of the major and minor barre chord shapes off of the 'A' string

Here is a chord chart of "The Weight":

The Weight Chord Chart


If any of this is incorrect, please contact us at:

  • Phone: 336-406-1319
